metadata.Title: CVE-2021-42553 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium.
metadata.Description: A buffer overflow vulnerability in stm32_mw_usb_host of STMicroelectronics in versions before 3.5.1 allows an attacker to execute arbitrary code when the descriptor contains more endpoints than USBH_MAX_NUM_ENDPOINTS. The library is typically integrated when using a RTOS such as FreeRTOS on STM32 MCUs.

notes.Note: ccdm94> it seems like the micropython package contains the code which is vulnerable under ports/stm32/usbhost/Core/Src/usbh_ctlreq.c.

criterions.comment: micropython package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
